duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide quality customer service and support in an at-home call center environment.
Ensure exceptional communication with customers, representing the company in a positive and professional manner.
Efficiently navigate computer systems and platforms to guide conversations and take notes during customer interactions.
Effectively communicate in both one-on-one and team environments, demonstrating strong verbal and written communication skills.
Maintain a quiet work environment free from background noise, ensuring customer interactions are conducted in a professional manner.
